name: Bug Out (wavertron)
description:
LD51 Compo Entry
      Theme: Every 10 seconds
.
           -=BUG OUT=- 
.
           HOW TO PLAY         
  Every 10 seconds, the maze changes   
  Find the Exit and escape the maze
  Shoot bugs and grapple around.
.        
            CONTROLS                 
  A/D         : Left/Right          
  MOUSE       : Aim
  LEFT CLICK  : Shoot Laser
  RIGHT CLICK : Shoot grappling hook 
.
  R           : Start Game   
  F12         : Maximise screen              
  ESC         : Quit to DOS  
.
  Made with Godot, C#             
            Aseprite, Paint.Net             
            BFXR, Audacity
